desc: Adds Possible Curse Effect to Normal Attack

dictionary.lore: In the Bariula Empire, before the gods destroyed it, there were many cases of innocents being executed. Ragu Blaze, the wielder of the Cursed Sabre, was said to be one of them, but his extraordinary magic powers set him apart. At the brink of execution he set a curse which enveloped the executioner's sword, resulting in the birth of a Cursed Sabre.

name: Cursed Sabre
